title: AE插件：专业图片视频电视墙分屏插件 DigiEffects Video Wall V1.0.1
author: 大众脸
content: 这是DigiEffects公司出品的一款专业图片视频电视墙分屏插件，可在AE中简单快速制作视频/图片排列和分屏效果，支持自定义行数、列数、间距、旋转等参数及三维空间摄像机，操作高效直观。An exciting new plugin that will save After Effects users hours of time. Using up to 10,000 elements with dozens of parameters, you can animate your wall or flatscreen a multitude of ways. High customizable and very intuitive!官方地址：http://www.digieffects.com/products/video-wall

download_links.name: AE插件：专业图片视频电视墙分屏插件 DigiEffects Video Wall V1.0.1
